website_summaries.verdict: Thickening and strengthening biotin shampoo with provitamin B5, cucumber, and aloe vera extract.
pros: Hair thickening and strengthening formula that includes cucumber extract and aloe vera for moisture
includes biotin for hair growth and to prevent breakage
cons: Some expected more volume, while others noticed their hair felt dirtier by midday

customer_reviews.title: Do it
customer_reviews.text: No more flat hair. After the first use my hair felt so strong, thick and shiny. Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.author: BBrooks27

customer_reviews.title: It smells awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: It smells awesome!!! I needed a shampoo that was sulfate free because of my dyed hair. I have a lot of hair, long, thick and frizzy and it falls a lot. Usually I need a lot of product to wash my hair (3 to 4 squeezes). I was impressed that only with 1 big squeeze, all my hair was frothy. It also came out easy, so that it did not feel sticky afterwards. If it smells this good, I am considering buying other products from this brand. Let's see how this product behaves in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: mk cat

customer_reviews.title: My hair falls out a lot less
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I bought this. It's a lot thicker than I thought and lathers really well. My hair definitely falls out less in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Neily

customer_reviews.title: recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used their shampoos in the past and been very happy with the professional level quality, so I tried this one. my hair is thinning and could really use some strengthening and anti-thining ingrediants. I am looking forward to long term results, so far so good!! it smells really good and leaves my hair rejuvenated and healthy- what could be better!? great company,I highly recommend their products!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rosenblum

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: My hair is very fine and because of a medication I had been taking I was (and still am) losing what little hair that I had. I have tried many products that have claimed to make you hair thicker but since Progaine I have never found one that worked. I have been using this shampoo for a couple of weeks now and from the very first washing my hair has felt thicker! I am very happy that I took a chance and bought this and I will continue to so in the future.
customer_reviews.author: PAIGE R. BUSKEY

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is amazing! It is thick and makes your hair feel smooth and soft. I love the feeling and use this shampoo only. I would definitely recommend it to anyone, no matter your hair type. A little of the shampoo will do a lot for your hair, you don’t need to pour half the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Rivka A.

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am balding and this the best shampoo I have used to date for fullness
customer_reviews.author: Marisa A. Seaton

customer_reviews.title: It work to save my hair.
customer_reviews.text: My hair was falling out with a different product. I gave this a try and it works great. My hair has stopped falling out and my scalp feels refreshed. My only con is that the bottle/amount is too small. That is not the usual case with shampoos. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed another product from this line. I purchased shampoo conditioner and the other thing for prepping hair for styling. Yes, no, not for me. Made me feel like I needed to rewash.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Problem
customer_reviews.text: Turns out I react to something in this shampoo. I itched for quite a while after the rinse out. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Connie B.

customer_reviews.title: My Stylist was delighted!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo for 2 months, and saw new growth, however at my most recent salon appointment, my Stylist commented multiple times how well my hair was growing in and mentioned how I have new growth all over my scalp. She thought it looked healthier too! ( and I did not even tell her I was trying a new shampoo, she noticed all on her own) So, this product gets 5 stars from me and I will be repurchasing after my bottle is finished.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: My hair is baby fine and thinning. After using this for a week, my hair was so dried out it started breaking off at the root. Need more hair, not less.
customer_reviews.author: ReeseR

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I don't see much difference in my hair actually except for it doesn't fly away as much. I guess its alright, but I was expecting a little more volume.
customer_reviews.author: Ladydi

customer_reviews.title: So far not too good.
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve only used the shampoo conditioner and leave in and only 3 times. So far it’s very drying. Makes my hair feel like straw. I’ve tried once using my own shampoo and this conditioner. Nope same. So maybe mixing my shampoo with mine? I’ll follow up
customer_reviews.author: M. Nail

customer_reviews.title: Volume plus a healthy natural clean
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo leaves my hair feeling naturally clean- not harshly or squeaky clean like shampoo generally does. Also it stays clean longer because it’s gentle on my hair. Brand name shampoos tend to make my scalp generate more oil into my hair after a shampoo, leaving my hair greasy the next day. It took about 2-3 weeks to notice an increase in volume. I have not tried the conditioner that goes with it. I’m very happy with my hair management since I started using this and completely quit the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not good to help oily hair
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would help cleanse my oily flat hair and make it stronger, but my hair was very oily after and didn’t do anything for it
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: No more shedding!
customer_reviews.text: While I haven’t noticed any changes to prevent breakage and promote thickening, my fiancé has definitely noticed a difference in my constant shedding. He says he hardly notices it now! Always a plus. Hopefully, the longer I use it, I will begin to notice a healthier transition for stronger, non breaking strands. Hoping for faster hair growth too! Will update. Awesome product for constant shedding though. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair very flat and felt greasy. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shane C. Hedlund

customer_reviews.title: Dried hair out
customer_reviews.text: I used this along with the conditioner. At first I really liked the product. After a month though I noticed my hair was becoming very dry and brittle and It felt like my hair was actually thinner than before I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Left my hair tangled.
customer_reviews.text: I have fine long hair and am always on the quest for a hair product that will not dry my hair out. I can't say this dried it out, but it did not make my hair feel fuller and I had to use some of a coconut oil mask to detangle my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Debi H

customer_reviews.title: Fresh scent and lather
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been having such a hard time with my once super thick, healthy hair. I decided to give this shampoo a try and am so very thrilled. It’s thin but lathers beautifully! The scent is fresh and clean...not a strong perfume scent—-truly fresh. I was just outside and when the wind blew, I caught the fragrance and just love it! My hair feels wonderful and healthy after using it a few days. I’ll follow up again in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Great value and worthwhile product to use
customer_reviews.text: I have thinning gray hair so decided to try the biotin products after my stylist recommended them. I bought the biotin conditioner and shampoo and while my hair isn't any thicker it certainly appears to be since I have been using them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Walcheski

customer_reviews.title: A luxurious shampoo without a luxury price tag
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Osensia O So Thick & Strong Shampoo for quite some time now. I've switched to other brands (some costing much more) on occasion, but keep coming back. You need only a small amount for a really thick, conditioning lather. I found other shampoos will eventually dry out my fine, color-treated hair. Not so with Osensia. I don't use the conditioner, but am very satisfied with the shampoo and may give the conditioner a try at some point.
customer_reviews.author: GardenGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great volume
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo smells great and a little goes a long way. I have been using for almost two months and it doesn't help my hair feel " full" or " thicker " but it gives my hair amazing volume which is always a plus. One star off because I wouldn't say it's a thickening shampoo but a volumizing one.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn

customer_reviews.title: No build up, not sure if it thickens hair.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve purchased a thickening shampoo. I don’t use conditioner often either but it leaves my hair clean, no build up. Smells good. Not sure if it actually leaves my hair thicker or not, I’ve got fine hair and a lot of it so I just look for extra volume that won’t weigh my hair down. I’d buy again but I may try another brand too.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula,  not for the better.
customer_reviews.text: Update. I reordered this product as it was great the first time I ordered it. Very disappointed when I received it this time as the shampoo is a thinner consistency, different color, and absent the great qualities from what I had purchased from same this same company previously. Below was my original post: I love this shampoo, I did notice a positive difference on my hair. The company lost a star because of shipping packaging. Product arrived with leakage causing a mess. Great product though.
customer_reviews.author: David Q

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine or thin hair!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the scent is light and refreshing and the consistency of the shampoo of not too thick or too thin. It builds a nice lather and leaves my hair feeling clean and refreshed. As soon as I blow dryer my hair I noticed more volume and body after just a few washes!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this shampoo several times which indicates satisfaction with its qualities. I love the thickness of the lather and the way my hair feels and looks after using this product. I am at an age when hair loss is common and I feel I am using a shampoo which will help control that.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny k

customer_reviews.title: Full, thicker hair, smell great works well with Marc Anthony
customer_reviews.text: This biotin. Shampoo works wonders. You only need a small amount and massage all over your head. Then I use my Marc Anthony thickening conditioner Plus a lsmall amount of Marc Anthony’s moisture to scald . Then blow dry!! Soft and full
customer_reviews.author: Marci Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I tried this shampoo on a whim. It is awesome! I generally don’t like these types of hair shampoos, but thus one is great! It smells good, lathers good, and has minimized the breakage of my extremely fine hair!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime J. Weenink

customer_reviews.title: Love the Product
customer_reviews.text: My bottle arrived leaking in my box. I do love this shampoo and now I need to buy the matching conditioner. It supports hair growth and strengthens and shines! All the things my hair needs!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miller

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way my hair responds to the product. However, the bottle cap could be improved. It tends to back up and stop the product from coming out of the bottle. Possible reorder on this one.
customer_reviews.author: DAnne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and it and I am 100% pleased with the results. Instant thicker hair with body!
customer_reviews.author: Debby Desnoyers

customer_reviews.title: Reformulated and not good
customer_reviews.text: This product used to be excellent (label O So thick and strong) with a wonderful fragrance and worked well to stop breakage, create thickness and shine. Apparently it has been reformulated (label says thickening) is runny, clear, and not fragrant.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Helped my damaged hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! My hair is badly damaged due to color and this shampoo has helped bring it back to life, my hair is soft and easy to handle now, I recommend you give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Halliday

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm impressed! My hair is soft, not super shiny but tangles seem to brush out easily. (Butt length, fine hair)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well, does dry hair out if used often
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is a great cleaning dirty oily hair. I wouldn't say it specifically thickens hair but it does have a slight "adds volume" effect! I wouldn't use this daily for thinner hair because it dries my hair out quickly if I use it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaked and missing product.
customer_reviews.text: What a mess and waste of money since it was 1/2 empty because it leaked. These are small bottles so every ounce counts. They don’t use the cardboard inner lid so it leaked and was so gross.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo smells so good! It became into a really nice thick lather ...
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo smells so good! It became into a really nice thick lather and it felt nice! I am happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: annonymous

customer_reviews.title: It does work
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both have thin hair and no body. We started using this shampoo roughly 3 weeks ago. I have noticed a difference in my hair. I do not see my bald spot in the front like I use to. My hairdresser noticed a difference as well. I have a short angled bob haircut and my daughter has medium length hair with long layers. She has felt a noticeable difference in her hair too.
customer_reviews.author: JYannuzzi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is amazing. After only a few days, I see an approvement. My hair feels and looks thicker and stronger. I use it together with the conditioner, which is just as amazing. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: EstLea

customer_reviews.title: Noticed a difference right away
customer_reviews.text: Less fall out at first use. Made my hair feel so much better after first wash and condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo. Makes hair feel great after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Volume
customer_reviews.text: Never will u have flat hair again this stuff does what it says I have thin hair myself an this will make my hair look an feel thicker with just one wash
customer_reviews.author: Antonia

customer_reviews.title: Sectacular Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Felt my hair thicken from the very first use. In just a little over a week, I'm already receiving compliments on how full my hair looks. What's even better, there's little to no hair in the drain when I shower. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: GiftBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Fuller hair but strip hair
customer_reviews.text: Left hair a little dry but made my hair fuller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Akinola similton

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband due to thinning hair. It works great for him. I’ve used it on muggy days when I know my hair will usually go flat. Smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: OMGOSH-IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: OMGOSH! IT WORKS! Need I say more? My baby-fine hair is actually thicker. Surprised!
customer_reviews.author: TinaChristina

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: like the lush thickness of the shampoo. Its a good clean good shampoo with no crap in it.
customer_reviews.author: GuitarGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good results from first use
customer_reviews.text: Only used it twice, very happy with it. A lot more volume to my hair and very little falling out.
customer_reviews.author: S.SCHULKOWSKI

customer_reviews.title: Sample very good
customer_reviews.text: I love it excellent I just need a conditioner know
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: The strength and thickness of my hair
customer_reviews.text: It works great work exactly how it’s is discribed you can’t go wrong with this product making my hair thick again
customer_reviews.author: Sherri n

customer_reviews.title: makes hair soft
customer_reviews.text: this shampoo makes my hair super soft and feel thicker love it
customer_reviews.author: KittyLover101

customer_reviews.title: i really liked it!!
customer_reviews.text: i really enjoyed how clean and soft my hair was after the 1st use! i can feel a little difference in regards to a slight increase to the volume of my very thin and fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Puente

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it for 5 days but my hair definitely feels fuller. Doesn’t leave any residue. Can’t wait to try it with the conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Laarni Samaniego

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, hair felt clean and full, not heavy like some volume products! Switched from Pureology which is just too expensive. $20+ dollars for 8.5 oz! Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Cleanses really well & my hair comes out very nice. There isn't a scent, but it's worth it to me , my hair feels great
customer_reviews.author: JBTX

customer_reviews.title: loose shampoo cap..spill
customer_reviews.text: Opened package and cap was opened... the entire shampoo spilled 🤦🏼
customer_reviews.author: rambi

customer_reviews.title: Best volume shampoo out there!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! I already have thick hair but this gave it just the right amount of volume. I love the scent and how soft it made my hair! This is definitely something I will keep purchasing. The price is right on point too!
customer_reviews.author: Jnalley419

customer_reviews.title: Repair damaged hair
customer_reviews.text: I needed a shampoo to help repair breakage. This really has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Mhenry

customer_reviews.title: not much efficient
customer_reviews.text: doesn't see thickening result as a man 42 years old- very much sorry:( i used several times already
customer_reviews.author: weronica

customer_reviews.title: Thickens hair
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing, thickens my fine hair so much that people notice. Highly recommended for those with thinning hair .
customer_reviews.author: k sakran

customer_reviews.title: Loosing more hair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo based on past reviews, but it did not work for me at all it made my hair fall out more and it did not add any volume or thickness to my hair. I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Sellitto

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged/half bottle wasted!!
customer_reviews.text: Much of this shampoo from this bottle was squeezed into the plastic wrapped around this bottle - unuseable and very wasteful - extremely dissatisfied! I tried to attach a photo but didn’t see how to include.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Vick

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my hair soft and shiny
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin hair, I used this shampoo and my hair feels great! It has a good smell and quality is amazing. It leaves my hair shiny and soft. Definitely, recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Varnica

customer_reviews.title: Products Value
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding the right shampoo for my hair type and can say this is the best product ever!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L Paeper

customer_reviews.title: Very lathering!
customer_reviews.text: I like how it smells and a little goes a long way. I will definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Yessica L. Martinez-silva

customer_reviews.title: Will buy qgain
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. Hair is much fuller than with the shampoo I had been using.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pat Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods inside!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received open...liquid all over the package. Nothing to return but an empty bottle do t want refund want replacement
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mera

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t seen much improvement in the last few months since I started.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Loss

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff. Very refreshing smell and thick consistency—you can tell it’s high quality. Will be using this for now on.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love the way my hair feels!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way my hair feels and smell when I use the shampoo! It does look like my hair is finally growing!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Not what the previous reviews said it was!
customer_reviews.text: This product had been used before I opened it. It was 3/4 the way full. I have oily hair, and it made my hair even oiler.
customer_reviews.author: Arren Scott

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do much
customer_reviews.text: It actually makes my hair limp. Regular drug store shampoos don't do as bad.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Blonde brightening
customer_reviews.text: I love how this shampoo popped my icy blonde back to the bright color it was like I just got it done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: It smells so good and my hair is smoother after using it
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Freitas

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Makes your hair feel soft and thick after hair dyes strip the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Korabel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The biotin and other vitamins really worked! It definitely makes the hair feel thicker!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My hair has more body and feels fuller - smells so nice and clean - I wish this came in a larger bottle
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Cutler

customer_reviews.title: I lost a lot of hair after using this since October of 2018
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, for me with this hair product, I lost copious amounts of hair. I am practically bald in the front. It is very dry and frizzy the rest of my hair. I am afraid to use it anymore, I gave excuses since it is Winter there will be hair loss, I am sick. No the Shampoo does not agree with me.
customer_reviews.author: Brahmin

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo leaves your hair dry, unmanageable and matted. It coats it with something that seems rather impenetrable. You pull more hair out trying to comb it after using this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: NILA

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cheap smell and does nothing for hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had so many positive reviews, but it smells terrible, like some kind of dollar store product. And it doesn't make my hair soft or increase growth or even prevent frizz. I does not do anything beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Word Nerd

customer_reviews.title: I liked it at first...
customer_reviews.text: But after several uses, it is very drying.... will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It's great to wash with, but then my hair feels dirty by midday. I am going to finish out the bottle in hopes something will change, but as of now I don't plan on buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Smells Bad
customer_reviews.text: These shampoos and conditioners don't really make hair feel/look fuller . The products really smell bad. Sour.
customer_reviews.author: rsa

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is not a thickening shampoo! It makes my hair weighed down and leaving it greasy
customer_reviews.author: Lawn nut

customer_reviews.title: Different formula than before
customer_reviews.text: I hate writing bad reviews but I wanted to warn others who are in my situation and maybe the company will realize they made a mistake! I am disappointed with my second bottle of this shampoo. I bought my first one in November 2019 and second in April 2020. They changed the formula!!! It used to be creamy, super concentrated (lasted forever) and smelled amazing! This new bottle is runny, clear and I don’t like the scent. I’ll try it out because it’s too late to return it, but I’m starting over on my search for a shampoo. I’d be happy to buy more if the company changes it back to the old formula!
customer_reviews.author: Simpka

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: After all the hype about this shampoo and conditioner, I did not notice anything, other than it lathered nicely in my hair. Not worth the price if that is all I get out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Vadas

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have had extremely thin hair since chemo several years ago and have tried MANY so-called volumizing shampoos. Most that have the claim haven't delivered. This one DOES and I save it to use on days I want my hair to look its best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: FULLNESS ACHIEVED
customer_reviews.text: I am a 73 yr. old lady (who is told she looks 50 or 60) partially because my hair is still it's natural light brown with hi-lites. I was a redhead when younger and supposedly we don't go gray. (maybe white, but no on the gray) So, my only pet peeve is that my hair is very fine. This shampoo and the conditioner absolutely make my hair fuller, and healthier looking. It feel great and looks great. Thanks to all the other reviewers for putting me onto a WINNER :)!
customer_reviews.author: j.b.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Very small bottle for the price
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to check the size. This bottle is very small.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie S.

customer_reviews.title: Biotin supposed to be good for your hair
customer_reviews.text: I love the my new Thickening Biotin Shampoo for Hair Growth. It's been a week that I've been using it so far I'm in love with the way my hair looks and feels. So if your questioning it try it I think you too will be happy with it. I have been under a lot of stress and my hair was falling out really bad and its actually doing so much better not a lot of hair on my hands while washing my hair since using this shampoo. I actually wanted to use a couple of times before I gave a review to see how I really liked it
customer_reviews.author: belidna sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Worked miracles for my thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been blessed with thick blond hair turned white. As I have gotten older my hair has thinned. I have been buying inexpensive volume building shampoos forever but they stopped doing as much. This product definitely gave me back the volume I had lost and more. A little hoes a long way. The bottle is small but the value is definitely there!
customer_reviews.author: I G

customer_reviews.title: The scent, the results, safe for color treated hair, and you only need a small portion=‘s AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is safe for color treated hair first off. So many products aren’t for thickening. The scent is AMAZING!! After using this product for a short period of time I am already seeing results. Another great part is this bottle should last for awhile. You only need a tiny portion.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rose-Heckman

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times so far, but hoping to see results. I'm not one of those expecting overnight results. Good news, I didn't lose a ton of hair in the shower like I normally do. I'm hoping this will help stop the hair loss. It also doesn't leave my scalp feeling greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce S

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: It is a good enough shampoo, but I don't think it thickens a lot - at least I have not noticed any appreciable difference in my hair. Perhaps I have to use it for a longer period - I have only used it for two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Alergy free so far
customer_reviews.text: I am super allergic to products with perfume, so I must use paraban /sulfate free products. This product is GREAT! My scalp is not itchy, my hair is silky...great product
customer_reviews.author: Stacey K

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo I’ve used in years
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best shampoos I have used since Bumble and Bumble in the 90s. I have fine, thin hair and this makes my hair fuller and cleaner longer. I highly recommend you at least try it. Oh and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Inside not what it says outside.
customer_reviews.text: The formula has changed from my previous order. This bottle had a clear formula not white and creamy and it did not lather as much. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is so thick it goes a LONG way. My hair is SUPER soft. I use the conditioner which is KEY. I’ve been growing hair back with the addition of a hair and nail vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

product_meta.title: Thickening Biotin Shampoo for Hair Growth - Sulfate and Paraben Free Shampoo - Aloe Vera, Color Safe, Anti Hair Loss Shampoo For Men and Women Prevents Breakage, Boosts Thicker Hair by Osensia
feature_bullets: STAY STRONG – Face the day with inner AND outer strength! When your hair is damaged, it looks dull, lifeless, and weak. But with Osensia’s hair strengthening shampoo, you can finally restore shine, prevent breakage, and bring your hair back to life, so you can feel stronger than ever!

AIN’T SEEN NOTHIN’ BETTER – No one wants a head full of dry brittle strands and split ends! Luckily, Osensia’s strengthening treatment returns moisture and smoothness to even the most unruly of hair! Whether your hair is curly, straight, colored, or natural, get the thickness and shine you’ve always craved

A MIRACLE MIXTURE – Kick breakage to the curb, naturally, with Osensia’s thick and full hair shampoo! Watch in awe as cucumber extract adds moisture and pro-vitamin B5 boosts shine. To top it off, we add biotin for hair growth and to prevent breakage to create a fast-acting, hair-protecting, sulfate and paraben free formula.

STRENGTH IN NUMBERS – Osensia’s hair thickening products work together to give you big, sexy hair that truly shows its health. And it all starts with the right wash! Our shampoo with biotin works to strengthen each individual strand. And for even tougher tresses, use our thickening shampoo and conditioner together for hair that shines from the inside out.

OUR PROMISE – We know you’ll love your locks the first time you use our anti hair loss shampoo. But, if you’re not impressed, that’s ok. You’re backed by our Osensia 100% satisfaction guarantee. No matter the reason, we’ll gladly refund or replace your thicker fuller hair shampoo – no questions asked
